TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlLink extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl

Docs.summary: Allows programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink> control.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically declare an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink> control and define its properties. For a complete, working code example, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink> class overview topic.
[!code-cs[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.web.ui.htmlcont_2_1.cs)] [!code-cs[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.web.ui.htmlcont_2_1.aspx)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.web.ui.htmlcont_2_1.aspx)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.web.ui.htmlcont_2_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string Href { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the URL target of the link specified in the control.
Docs.value: The URL target of the link.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The Href property specifies the URL target of the link specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink> control. You can use this property to specify the location of an external cascading style sheet (CSS).
## Examples The following code example demonstrates setting the Href property to a cascading style sheet (CSS) that is saved in the same directory as the Web page. For a complete, working code example, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink> class overview topic.
[!code-cs[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.web.ui.htmlcont_2_1.cs)] [!code-cs[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.web.ui.htmlcont_2_1.aspx)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.web.ui.htmlcont_2_1.aspx)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.web.ui.htmlcont_2_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void Render(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed

Docs.param: The that receives the rendered content.
Docs.summary: Renders the control to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Render method renders a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> closing bracket (/>) if the ASP.NET application is configured to render XHTML-compliant markup. By default, ASP.NET pages and controls render markup that is compatible with the XHTML 1.1 standard. For more information on configuring an ASP.NET Web site for non-XHTML rendering, see [NIB: How to: Configure XHTML Rendering in ASP.NET Web Sites](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/42483a54-f1ae-44e1-88e6-4370f8690149).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void RenderAttributes(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed

Docs.param: The that receives the rendered content.
Docs.summary: Renders the control's attributes to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The RenderAttributes method resolves the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink.Href%2A> property before calling the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.RenderAttributes%2A> method.
